title: New Moon: The Graphic Novel, Vol. 2
description: NOTE: The publication of this volume has been delayed indefinitely. Amazon has a placeholder date listed as 25th of December 2034, but this isn't the actual publication date.Bella and Edward find themselves facing new obstacles, including a devastating separation, the mysterious appearance of dangerous wolves roaming the forest in Forks, a terrifying threat of revenge from a female vampire and a deliciously sinister encounter with Italy's reigning royal family of vampires: the Volturi.
author: Young Kim
